items.title: About Us
items.body_html:
Pioneers in Privacy-First Digital Transformation

At Wilkes & Liberty, we are more than a digital services company—we are champions of digital sovereignty, dedicated to empowering enterprises with secure, innovative solutions that protect data, drive efficiency, and foster growth. Founded on the principles of privacy, security, and open-source collaboration, our mission is to help private sector organizations navigate the complexities of the modern digital landscape. As a hybrid product-service provider, we blend reusable platforms with expert consulting to deliver tailored outcomes that address real-world challenges like data breaches, censorship, and regulatory compliance.

Our journey is rooted in a commitment to excellence, drawing from cutting-edge technologies like XRPLedger for blockchain and Drupal for content management, while specializing in high-demand areas such as AI, cybersecurity, and digital modernization. With a 100% U.S.-based team serving the Americas in English, Spanish, and Russian, we never outsource, ensuring every project benefits from our in-house expertise. We've helped clients achieve 40-60% efficiency gains, 50% risk reductions, and enhanced ROI across sectors—proving that secure digital innovation isn't just possible; it's profitable. Join us in building a future where technology serves your goals, not the other way around.

Our Story: From Vision to Impact

Wilkes & Liberty was born from a vision to create digital capabilities that prioritize user sovereignty and ethical innovation. In a world increasingly dominated by surveillance and data exploitation, we set out to offer alternatives: open-source, privacy-centric tools that empower businesses without compromising security. Over the years, we've evolved into a trusted partner for enterprises seeking resilient solutions, from AI-driven financial optimization to censorship-resistant cloud operations.

Our growth reflects the trust of our clients, who value our hybrid approach—combining ready-to-deploy products like Private LLMs and Zero Trust frameworks with services such as AI specialist support and custom software development. This model has enabled us to serve diverse industries, delivering measurable results like streamlined workflows in legal firms and secure patient data management in health providers. We're proud of our 100% U.S.-based team, ensuring high-quality, in-house delivery across the Americas with multilingual support.

Our Core Values: Guiding Every Capability

Our values shape everything we do, ensuring our technologies, services, and solutions align with your needs for secure, ethical digital transformation:

  • Privacy Paramount: We embed features like zero-knowledge proofs and obfuscation in every offering to protect against breaches and censorship, giving you full data control.
  • Open-Source Innovation: Prioritizing tools like Drupal and XRPLedger, we foster transparency, reduce costs, and enable rapid, community-driven advancements.
  • Hybrid Flexibility: Our blend of products (e.g., Digital Health ID platforms) and services (e.g., cybersecurity consulting) provides scalable, customized solutions without vendor lock-in.
  • Enterprise Focus: Tailored for sectors like finance and health, we deliver ROI through 40% efficiency gains and 50% risk reductions, helping you compete and lead.
  • Sovereignty & Resilience: We build capabilities resistant to threats from state or non-state actors, ensuring your operations remain uninterrupted and independent.

These values drive our interconnected ecosystem, where AI integrates with blockchain for fraud-proof systems, or cloud ops pair with digital modernization for future-proof infrastructures—creating synergies that amplify your success.

Our Team: Experts Dedicated to Your Success

Our 100% U.S.-based team brings diverse expertise in AI, blockchain, cybersecurity, and more, serving the Americas with fluency in English, Spanish, and Russian. We never outsource, ensuring consistent quality and deep understanding of your needs. From seasoned developers crafting custom software to specialists optimizing cloud ops, our professionals are committed to privacy-first innovation. Meet our leadership and learn more about the people powering your digital future on our Leadership page.

Our Impact: Real Results Across Industries

We've partnered with enterprises to achieve transformative outcomes:

  • In finance, our Financial Optimization solution reduced fraud by 50% through AI analytics.
  • In health, Digital Health ID platforms improved patient data security, cutting breach risks by 60%.
  • In legal, Private LLMs streamlined research, boosting productivity by 40%.
  • Across sectors, our Zero Trust and cloud ops have ensured censorship-resistant resilience, with 99% uptime.

See more success stories on our Case Studies page, showcasing how our capabilities deliver 40-60% efficiency gains and enhanced ROI.

Join Us in Shaping the Future

Wilkes & Liberty is committed to corporate citizenship, supporting initiatives in digital literacy and open-source communities. Stay updated with our latest News or explore our Contract Vehicles for partnership opportunities.

Ready to experience privacy-first digital excellence? Contact Us today—our team is eager to collaborate and help your enterprise thrive.
items.meta_description: Committed to privacy-first innovation, blending advanced technologies, expert services, and transformative solutions to empower enterprises with secure, sovereign digital capabilities.

items.title: Contact Us
items.body_html:
Your Gateway to Privacy-First Digital Innovation

At Wilkes & Liberty, we make it simple and straightforward to connect with our team, all of whom are based 100% in the United States, ensuring we never outsource any aspect of our work. Specializing in servicing all of the Americas, we communicate fluently in English, Spanish, and Russian to support your needs seamlessly. Whether you're inquiring about AI-driven optimizations, secure blockchain integrations, or comprehensive cybersecurity strategies, our experts are ready to provide personalized insights and support. We pride ourselves on being highly responsive, with direct access to specialists who understand your challenges and can help your enterprise thrive—no delays, just meaningful conversations that lead to real results.

Our clients appreciate our approachable style: "Wilkes & Liberty responded quickly and tailored their expertise to our exact needs—true partners from day one." With a focus on accessibility, we're available whenever inspiration strikes or urgency demands. Reach out today to explore how our hybrid product-service model can deliver up to 40% efficiency gains and unbreakable security for your business. Let's start the dialogue and uncover opportunities together.

Get in Touch

We're committed to being reachable in ways that suit you best, offering multiple secure channels for communication.

  • Address: 160 W. Camino Real #945, Boca Raton FL 33432
  • Phone: (561) 834-4503
  • Email: admin@wilkesliberty.com

Our U.S.-based team ensures every interaction is handled in-house, reflecting our dedication to quality and sovereignty in serving clients across the Americas.

Send Us a Message

Use our secure contact form below to share your thoughts or questions—we value your privacy, so all submissions are encrypted and handled confidentially. Tell us how we can assist, and one of our specialists will respond promptly to kickstart your journey.

Why Reach Out to Wilkes & Liberty?

Connecting with us means partnering with a team that's fully committed to your success, drawing from our deep expertise in privacy-first solutions. Here's what makes us the ideal choice and why reaching out is your next best step:

  • We offer personalized expertise from the start, tailoring our insights to your industry—whether finance, health, or legal—based on our comprehensive services like AI support, cloud ops, and custom development.
  • Our rapid response ensures you get the attention you deserve, with in-house specialists ready to discuss ideas in English, Spanish, or Russian, reflecting our specialization in the Americas.
  • Every conversation prioritizes your privacy and security, treated with the same care we apply to our solutions—encrypted and confidential from first contact.
  • Clients achieve proven results, like 40% efficiency boosts and 50% risk reductions, through our hybrid approach—let's explore how we can replicate that for you.
  • No-obligation consultations mean you can start with a casual chat, gaining valuable knowledge without commitment—our goal is to empower you right away.

Common reasons clients contact us include optimizing AI for financial workflows, securing cloud infrastructures against threats, or developing custom software resistant to censorship. Whatever your vision, we're here to make it reality with our accessible, U.S.-based team.

Ready to Connect?

Take the first step toward digital empowerment—reach out now and discover the Wilkes & Liberty difference. With our team fully in the United States and focused on the Americas, we're easily accessible and eager to collaborate. Fill out the form above, call us at (561) 834-4503, or email admin@wilkesliberty.com. Let's discuss your needs and build a secure, innovative future together.

We look forward to hearing from you!
items.meta_description: Reach out to Wilkes & Liberty for expert guidance on privacy-first digital solutions. We're easily accessible via phone, email, or our secure contact form—let's discuss how we can empower your enterprise today.

items.title: Contract Vehicles
items.body_html:
Contract Vehicles: Streamlined Procurement for Secure Digital Innovation

At Wilkes & Liberty, we simplify government procurement through a selection of premier contract vehicles, allowing federal agencies and eligible entities to acquire our privacy-first digital services efficiently. These pre-negotiated agreements reduce administrative burdens, accelerate timelines, and provide competitive pricing for our expertise in AI, blockchain, cloud operations, cybersecurity, digital identity, modernization, infrastructure, and software development. As a B2B company focused on sovereign solutions, we prioritize vehicles that support IT and professional services, ensuring quick access to our hybrid offerings while maintaining data security and compliance.

Our contract vehicles are chosen for their relevance to high-demand areas like cybersecurity and AI, aligning with trends in government IT spending (projected at $140 billion in 2025 per Gartner). By leveraging these, agencies can achieve up to 30% faster deployments and cost savings, all while benefiting from our U.S.-based team's multilingual support in English, Spanish, and Russian. Whether you're a new IT project owner or renewing services, these vehicles position us as your ideal partner for resilient, innovative digital capabilities. Explore below to see how we can support your mission through these efficient procurement paths.

Our Key Contract Vehicles

We hold positions on the following vehicles, selected for their broad applicability to our services and strong track record in facilitating secure, sovereign digital transformations.

GSA Multiple Award Schedule (MAS)

The GSA MAS, also known as the GSA Schedule, is a long-term governmentwide contract offering access to millions of commercial products and services at discounted pricing. Managed by the General Services Administration, it's the most widely used vehicle for federal procurement, supporting purchases by state, local, and non-profit entities as well.

  • Key Benefits: Streamlined ordering via blanket purchase agreements (BPAs), pre-negotiated terms for faster acquisition, and volume discounts that reduce costs by 20-30%. Ideal for recurring needs in IT services.
  • How It Fits Our Offerings: Perfect for procuring our cybersecurity consulting, AI specialist support, or software development services, enabling agencies to quickly deploy privacy-focused solutions like Zero Trust frameworks or Private LLMs without lengthy bidding processes.
  • Best For Wilkes & Liberty: As a versatile entry point for IT/digital services, this vehicle allows us to serve a wide range of government clients, making it a top priority for our expansion into secure, sovereign contracting.

CIO-SP3 Small Business

CIO-SP3 Small Business is a Governmentwide Acquisition Contract (GWAC) administered by the National Institutes of Health Information Technology Acquisition and Assessment Center (NITAAC), focused on IT solutions and services for small businesses.

  • Key Benefits: Set-aside for small businesses, offering 10-year terms, flexible task orders, and rapid awards (average 45 days). Supports NAICS codes for computer programming and systems design, with ceilings up to $20 billion.
  • How It Fits Our Offerings: Suited for our custom software development, digital modernization, and AI services, allowing government contractors to access private cloud ops or blockchain integrations through streamlined, competitive procurement.
  • Best For Wilkes & Liberty: As an emerging player in B2B digital services, this set-aside vehicle aligns with our growth strategy, providing exclusive opportunities for our privacy-centric IT solutions in federal projects.

Alliant 2

Alliant 2 is a GWAC managed by GSA for comprehensive IT services, emphasizing innovative technologies and large-scale integrations with a $75 billion ceiling.

  • Key Benefits: 10-year duration, multiple award types (e.g., fixed-price, time-and-materials), and focus on emerging tech like AI and cybersecurity—enabling agile procurement with pre-vetted vendors.
  • How It Fits Our Offerings: Ideal for our infrastructure and cybersecurity services, supporting deployments of Zero Trust architectures or AI for financial optimization in government IT projects.
  • Best For Wilkes & Liberty: This vehicle's emphasis on advanced IT makes it perfect for our capabilities in AI and blockchain, positioning us for high-value contracts in secure digital transformation.

OASIS (One Acquisition Solution for Integrated Services)

OASIS is a GSA-managed MAC for professional services, including IT consulting, with pools for different business sizes and a $60 billion ceiling.

  • Key Benefits: Flexible for new or ongoing projects, with best-in-class vendors and support for complex, integrated services—reducing procurement time by 50%.
  • How It Fits Our Offerings: Supports our software development and digital modernization consulting, enabling agencies to acquire custom AI platforms or content management systems efficiently.
  • Best For Wilkes & Liberty: As a multi-agency vehicle for professional IT services, OASIS is a strategic fit for our consulting-led offerings, allowing us to compete in large-scale government initiatives.

8(a) STARS III

8(a) STARS III is a GSA GWAC for small disadvantaged businesses, focused on IT services with an $50 billion ceiling and emphasis on emerging technologies.

  • Key Benefits: Set-aside for 8(a)-certified firms, 8-year term, and streamlined ordering for new IT/digital projects—promoting diversity while accelerating acquisitions.
  • How It Fits Our Offerings: Aligned with our AI specialist support and blockchain development, enabling government access to our privacy-focused solutions like Private LLMs.
  • Best For Wilkes & Liberty: If pursuing 8(a) certification, this vehicle offers exclusive opportunities for our IT services, making it a prime target for growth in federal contracting.

SeaPort-NxG

SeaPort-NxG is a Navy-managed IDIQ for engineering and program management services, with a $50 billion ceiling and focus on IT support.

  • Key Benefits: Multiple award, 10-year term, and broad scope for IT/digital services—facilitating quick task orders for specialized projects.
  • How It Fits Our Offerings: Supports our cybersecurity and software development for Navy-related IT, including secure cloud ops and digital identity platforms.
  • Best For Wilkes & Liberty: As a vehicle for defense-adjacent IT, it complements our security expertise, positioning us for contracts requiring sovereign, resilient digital capabilities.

Why Contract Vehicles Matter for Your Procurement

Contract vehicles streamline government buying, offering pre-vetted vendors, competitive pricing, and faster timelines—reducing administrative burdens by 30-50%. For Wilkes & Liberty, these vehicles enable efficient delivery of our privacy-first services, ensuring agencies can access our expertise in AI, blockchain, and cybersecurity without delays. We're committed to expanding our portfolio, prioritizing vehicles like GSA MAS and CIO-SP3 for broad IT access, and set-asides like 8(a) STARS III for inclusive growth.

Partner with us through these vehicles to secure innovative, sovereign digital solutions. Contact Us for details on how we can support your procurement needs or to discuss upcoming opportunities.
items.meta_description: Wilkes & Liberty offers access to premier contract vehicles for streamlined government procurement, enabling efficient acquisition of our privacy-first digital services in AI, blockchain, cybersecurity, and more.

items.title: Corporate Citizenship
items.body_html:
Corporate Citizenship: Revolutionary Responsibility in Action

Following Wilkes' commitment to society and the common good, Wilkes & Liberty practices corporate citizenship that advances digital liberation for all—not just our clients. True responsibility means building a more sovereign digital future for everyone.

Revolutionary Corporate Philosophy

Corporate citizenship in the digital age means more than charity or compliance—it means actively working to liberate society from surveillance capitalism and technological oppression. Our responsibilities extend beyond profit to include the advancement of digital human rights.

The Liberation Citizenship Model

  • Digital Rights Advocacy: Using our platform to advance technological independence for all
  • Open Source Contribution: Sharing sovereignty tools that benefit the entire liberation movement
  • Educational Mission: Teaching others to achieve and maintain digital independence
  • Community Empowerment: Strengthening local communities' resistance to digital tyranny

Our Citizenship Commitments

Digital Liberation Foundation

Open Source Sovereignty Tools We contribute significant resources to developing and maintaining open-source tools that advance digital sovereignty. These tools remain freely available regardless of commercial relationships, ensuring broad access to liberation technologies.

Educational Resources The foundation provides comprehensive educational materials, training programs, and certification courses that teach organizations how to achieve and maintain digital independence.

Community Support We provide free consulting and technical support to non-profit organizations, educational institutions, and community groups working to resist surveillance capitalism.

Privacy Rights Advocacy

Legislative Engagement Our legal team actively engages in legislative processes to strengthen digital privacy rights and oppose surveillance expansion. We provide expert testimony, research, and policy recommendations that advance digital liberty.

Constitutional Defense We support legal challenges to unconstitutional surveillance programs and provide resources to organizations fighting for digital rights in court.

International Cooperation We collaborate with international privacy rights organizations to resist the global expansion of surveillance capitalism and authoritarian digital control.

Ethical Business Practices

Supply Chain Independence We maintain supply chains that avoid surveillance economy participants and support suppliers who share our commitment to digital independence.

Employment Practices Our workforce policies protect employee privacy, encourage independent thinking, and provide opportunities for professional development in sovereignty technologies.

Vendor Relationships We work only with partners who share our commitment to client sovereignty and refuse to compromise on surveillance resistance.

Community Investment

Local Technology Independence We invest in local technology infrastructure that reduces community dependence on surveillance-based platforms and services.

Digital Literacy Programs We provide free training programs that teach individuals and small businesses how to protect their digital privacy and achieve greater technological independence.

Civic Technology Support We provide pro-bono services to local governments and civic organizations seeking to implement citizen-privacy-preserving digital services.

Environmental Responsibility

Sustainable Operations

Green Technology Infrastructure Our data centers and technology infrastructure prioritize renewable energy sources and minimal environmental impact while maintaining complete operational security.

Efficient Resource Usage We design solutions that maximize performance while minimizing energy consumption and hardware requirements.

Lifecycle Responsibility We take responsibility for the entire lifecycle of our technology solutions, including secure disposal and recycling of hardware components.

Digital Carbon Footprint

Efficient Computing Our sovereignty-preserving technologies are designed to be more efficient than surveillance-based alternatives, reducing overall digital energy consumption.

Local Processing By enabling local data processing and reducing dependence on cloud-based surveillance systems, we help reduce the massive energy consumption of centralized data collection networks.

Corporate Governance

Ethical Leadership Our leadership team operates under strict ethical guidelines that prioritize client sovereignty and digital liberation over profit maximization.

Transparent Operations We maintain operational transparency that allows stakeholders to verify our commitment to sovereignty principles without compromising operational security.

Stakeholder Accountability We are accountable to all stakeholders in the digital liberation movement, not just shareholders or customers.

Regulatory Compliance

Privacy-First Compliance We achieve all necessary regulatory compliance while maintaining our commitment to client privacy and operational independence.

Ethical Standards We exceed industry ethical standards and actively work to raise the bar for ethical behavior in the technology sector.

International Standards We adhere to the highest international standards for digital privacy and human rights, even in jurisdictions where such standards are not legally required.

The Citizenship Revolution

True corporate citizenship in the digital age means taking responsibility for the broader impact of technology on human freedom and dignity. We measure success not just in profit, but in the advancement of digital liberation for all.

Community Impact Metrics

Organizations Liberated We track the number of organizations we've helped achieve complete digital independence from surveillance systems.

Privacy Rights Advanced We measure our contribution to strengthening digital privacy rights through advocacy, education, and direct action.

Sovereignty Tools Distributed We monitor the adoption and impact of our open-source sovereignty tools in communities worldwide.

Long-Term Commitments

Generational Responsibility We build technologies and practices that will continue advancing digital liberation for future generations.

Systemic Change We work toward systemic change that makes surveillance capitalism unsustainable and digital sovereignty the norm.

Global Impact We collaborate with international partners to advance digital liberation on a global scale.

Join the Citizenship Revolution

Corporate citizenship is not a solo endeavor—it requires collaboration with others who share the vision of a more liberated digital future. We invite partners, clients, and community members to join our citizenship initiatives.

Ready to participate in revolutionary corporate citizenship? Contact our citizenship team and discover how to contribute to the broader movement for digital liberation and technological independence.
items.meta_description: Wilkes & Liberty's commitment to corporate citizenship through digital rights advocacy, open-source contributions, and community empowerment for a more sovereign digital future.

items.title: Leadership
items.body_html:
Leadership: The Architects of Digital Liberation

Like Wilkes' courageous leadership in the face of authoritarian power, our leadership team comprises visionaries who refuse to accept the surveillance state's dominance over digital life. We lead by example, building the technologies and strategies that others follow.

Revolutionary Leadership Philosophy

True leadership in the digital age means rejecting comfortable compliance with surveillance capitalism and choosing the harder path of genuine innovation. Our leaders don't just manage—they liberate, inspire, and forge new pathways to technological independence.

The Liberation Leadership Model

  • Principled Vision: Leadership guided by unwavering commitment to digital sovereignty
  • Revolutionary Courage: The willingness to challenge entrenched surveillance systems
  • Operational Excellence: Delivering results while maintaining absolute privacy principles
  • Strategic Independence: Decision-making free from external influence and control

Our Leadership Team

Executive Leadership

Chief Executive Officer Champion of Digital Sovereignty

Leading Wilkes & Liberty's mission to liberate organizations from technological tyranny. Brings decades of experience building independent systems that resist surveillance and external control. Committed to proving that revolutionary capability and complete privacy are inseparable.

Chief Technology Officer Architect of Liberation Technology

Designs and oversees the development of sovereignty-preserving technologies that serve clients without surveillance. Expert in creating systems that operate independently of Big Tech infrastructure while delivering superior capabilities.

Chief Privacy Officer Guardian of Digital Rights

Ensures every solution strengthens rather than compromises client privacy and operational independence. Specialist in privacy-by-design architecture and regulatory compliance that protects rather than exposes client interests.

Chief Operations Officer Master of Sovereign Operations

Manages the delivery of complex solutions while maintaining complete operational security. Expert in building scalable operations that serve client needs without creating surveillance vulnerabilities.

Strategic Advisory Board

Former Intelligence Executive Strategic Intelligence Advisor

Brings deep understanding of threats to digital sovereignty from government and corporate surveillance networks. Advises on operational security and threat modeling for high-stakes environments.

Former Technology Executive Innovation Strategy Advisor

Former leader at major technology companies who witnessed firsthand the surveillance capitalism machine. Now dedicated to building alternatives that serve users rather than exploit them.

Digital Rights Attorney Legal Liberation Advisor

Constitutional law expert specializing in digital rights and privacy protection. Ensures our solutions not only protect client interests but actively strengthen their legal position against surveillance overreach.

Leadership Principles

Servant Leadership for Digital Liberty

Our leaders serve the cause of digital independence, not personal ambition. Every decision is evaluated against our core mission: strengthening client sovereignty and weakening surveillance systems.

Operational Security Culture

Leadership by example means our executives operate with the same security and privacy standards we recommend to clients. No exceptions, no compromises, no shortcuts.

Strategic Independence

Our leadership maintains complete independence from surveillance capitalism interests. No venture capital with surveillance ties, no partnerships that compromise client sovereignty, no board members with conflicting loyalties.

Revolutionary Responsibility

We accept responsibility not just for our clients' success, but for advancing the broader cause of digital liberation. Our leadership decisions consider impact on the entire sovereignty movement.

The Leadership Commitment

Our leadership team has made a binding commitment: we will never compromise client sovereignty for business convenience, never accept surveillance capitalism as inevitable, and never stop fighting for a more liberated digital future.

Every leader at Wilkes & Liberty operates under the same principle that guided John Wilkes: liberty is not negotiable, independence is not optional, and freedom requires constant vigilance against those who would control and monitor.

Ready to work with leaders who put your sovereignty first? Contact our leadership team and discover what it means to have technology leaders who serve your independence, not surveillance interests.
items.meta_description: Meet Wilkes & Liberty's visionary leadership team committed to digital sovereignty and privacy-first innovation, building technologies that liberate enterprises from surveillance capitalism.

items.title: News
items.body_html:
News: Chronicles of the Digital Liberation Movement

"As Wilkes used publications to inform citizens about their rights and the struggle for liberty, our news section keeps you informed about the ongoing battle for digital sovereignty and the victories won by those who refuse to surrender their technological independence."

Stay current with breaking developments in digital liberation, privacy technology breakthroughs, regulatory changes, and success stories from organizations achieving true technological sovereignty.

Latest News & Updates

Recent Developments

January 2025: Major Privacy Legislation Advances New federal privacy legislation shows promise for strengthening individual digital rights while limiting corporate surveillance overreach. Our analysis reveals both opportunities and potential loopholes.

December 2024: Enterprise AI Sovereignty Breakthrough Multiple Fortune 500 companies successfully deploy completely private AI systems, proving that cutting-edge artificial intelligence and absolute data sovereignty are not just compatible—they're superior.

November 2024: International Digital Rights Coalition Formed Allied nations establish framework for mutual digital sovereignty protection, creating new opportunities for privacy-preserving international cooperation.

News Categories

Technology Breakthroughs

  • Privacy-Preserving Innovations: Latest developments in surveillance-resistant technology
  • Sovereign AI Advances: Breakthrough in private artificial intelligence systems
  • Decentralized Infrastructure: New tools for organizational independence
  • Security Enhancements: Advanced protection against digital threats

Regulatory & Legal Developments

  • Digital Rights Legislation: New laws protecting individual privacy and organizational sovereignty
  • Corporate Accountability: Legal victories against surveillance capitalism
  • International Cooperation: Cross-border privacy protection agreements
  • Regulatory Resistance: Defeating attempts to expand surveillance powers

Industry Success Stories

  • Digital Liberation Victories: Organizations successfully achieving technological independence
  • Privacy Implementation Success: Real-world deployment of sovereignty-preserving solutions
  • Surveillance Resistance: Companies and institutions rejecting data harvesting platforms
  • Independence Achievements: Breaking free from Big Tech dependency

Threat Intelligence

  • Surveillance Expansion Warnings: Early alerts about new monitoring capabilities
  • Corporate Overreach Exposure: Revealing hidden data collection practices
  • Government Surveillance Updates: Tracking state monitoring program developments
  • Digital Rights Threats: Identifying legislation that could compromise sovereignty

Featured News Stories

Digital Liberation Milestones

Government Agency Achieves Complete Digital Independence A major federal agency successfully migrated all operations to sovereignty-preserving infrastructure, eliminating foreign technology dependencies while improving operational efficiency.

Healthcare Network Protects 2 Million Patient Records Regional healthcare system implements patient-sovereign identity management, ensuring medical privacy while enabling seamless care coordination across multiple facilities.

Financial Institution Eliminates Surveillance Dependencies Community bank deploys completely private AI for risk assessment and customer service, proving that financial innovation and client privacy are mutually reinforcing.

Privacy Technology Advances

Zero-Knowledge Authentication Reaches Production Scale New cryptographic protocols enable identity verification without personal data exposure, making surveillance-based authentication systems obsolete.

Decentralized Communication Networks Expand Globally Privacy-preserving communication infrastructure now available in 50+ countries, providing surveillance-resistant alternatives to corporate messaging platforms.

Quantum-Resistant Encryption Deployment Accelerates Organizations worldwide rapidly adopt next-generation encryption to protect against future quantum computing threats to current security systems.

Breaking News Alerts

Immediate Updates

  • Real-time surveillance threat notifications
  • Emergency privacy protection advisories
  • Critical security vulnerability warnings
  • Urgent digital rights response needs

Weekly Intelligence Briefing

  • Digital sovereignty developments summary
  • Privacy technology breakthrough analysis
  • Regulatory change impact assessments
  • Liberation movement progress reports

Industry Analysis & Commentary

Strategic Insights

  • Technology Independence Trends: Analysis of the movement toward digital sovereignty
  • Surveillance Economy Disruption: How privacy-first alternatives challenge traditional business models
  • Regulatory Environment Evolution: Understanding changing legal landscapes for digital rights
  • International Sovereignty Cooperation: Global coordination on digital independence initiatives

Expert Commentary

  • Leadership Perspectives: Insights from digital liberation thought leaders
  • Technical Analysis: Deep-dive assessments of emerging privacy technologies
  • Strategic Recommendations: Guidance for organizations pursuing digital independence
  • Future Predictions: Forecasting the evolution of digital sovereignty movement

News Archives

2024 Highlights

  • Record number of organizations achieve complete digital independence
  • Major privacy legislation passed in multiple jurisdictions
  • Surveillance capitalism business models face unprecedented legal challenges
  • Private AI deployments exceed cloud-based solutions in enterprise adoption

Historical Milestones

  • First government agency achieves complete digital sovereignty
  • Initial deployment of production-ready private AI systems
  • Establishment of international digital rights protection framework
  • Launch of decentralized communication networks

Stay Informed

Subscription Options

  • Daily News Brief: Essential updates on digital sovereignty developments
  • Weekly Intelligence Report: Comprehensive analysis of privacy and liberation trends
  • Monthly Strategic Outlook: Long-term implications of digital independence movements
  • Breaking News Alerts: Immediate notifications of critical developments

News Sources

  • Verified Intelligence: Fact-checked reporting on digital sovereignty developments
  • Expert Analysis: Commentary from recognized leaders in privacy and independence technology
  • Primary Sources: Direct access to official announcements and documentation
  • Community Reports: Updates from organizations implementing digital liberation

Contact Our Newsroom

Have a tip about digital sovereignty developments? Know of an organization achieving technological independence? Our newsroom investigates stories that advance the cause of digital liberation.

News Tips: Submit confidential information about surveillance overreach or privacy victories Story Suggestions: Recommend organizations and developments for feature coverage Expert Sources: Connect our journalists with knowledgeable sources in digital sovereignty Press Inquiries: Media requests about Wilkes & Liberty positions and analysis

Ready to Stay Informed About Digital Liberation?

Subscribe to our news updates and join the informed resistance against surveillance capitalism. Knowledge is power, and power serves liberty.

items.title: Capabilities
items.body_html:
Empowering Enterprises with Privacy-First Digital Capabilities

In a world where digital threats, regulatory demands, and competitive pressures converge, enterprises need capabilities that not only innovate but also protect and empower. At Wilkes & Liberty, our capabilities represent a holistic ecosystem of technologies, services, and solutions designed to deliver secure, sovereign digital transformation. Rooted in open-source principles and a hybrid product-service model, we specialize in areas like AI, blockchain, cloud operations, and cybersecurity—ensuring privacy and security are paramount while driving measurable outcomes such as 40-60% efficiency gains, reduced risks, and enhanced ROI.

Inspired by the spirit of digital liberty, our offerings span advanced technologies for foundational tools, specialized services for expert implementation, and ready-to-deploy solutions for immediate impact. This integrated approach helps private sector leaders in finance, health, legal, education, civil engineering, and government thrive amid challenges like data breaches, censorship, and rapid tech evolution. Whether you're optimizing financial workflows or securing health identities, our capabilities provide the resilience and agility to lead in your industry. Explore how they work individually and collectively to unlock your enterprise's full potential.

Our Core Capabilities

We organize our expertise into interconnected pillars—Technology for enablers, Services for execution, and Solutions for outcomes—each blending privacy, open-source innovation, and hybrid flexibility.

Artificial Intelligence

Harness ethical, data-sovereign AI for automation and insights, with features like privacy-centric models and high-performance processing. Ideal for predictive analytics in finance or diagnostics in health, delivering 30% operational speed boosts.

Explore AI Technology | AI Services | AI Solutions

Blockchain

Decentralized ledgers for transparent transactions, emphasizing sustainability and privacy with XRPLedger. Supports supply chain tracking and DeFi, reducing costs by 50% while resisting censorship.

Explore Blockchain Technology | Blockchain Services | Blockchain Solutions

Cloud Operations

Secure, multi-platform management with obfuscation for threat resistance, supporting AWS/Azure and hybrid setups. Ensures 99% uptime and sovereignty against adversarial actions.

Explore Cloud Technology | Cloud Services | Cloud Solutions

Content Management

Composable platforms like Drupal for scalable digital experiences, with security for compliant workflows. Enhances content handling by 40% in education or legal portals.

Explore Content Management Technology | Content Services | Related Solutions

Cybersecurity

Proactive defenses with Zero Trust and AI threat detection, protecting against quantum risks and supply chain attacks. Reduces breaches by 60% in high-stakes environments.

Explore Cybersecurity Technology | Cybersecurity Services | Zero Trust Solution

Digital Identity

Self-sovereign platforms for secure verification, integrating verifiable credentials. Ideal for health IDs or financial KYC, cutting fraud by 50%.

Explore Digital Identity Technology | Identity Services | Identity Solutions

Digital Modernization

Agile upgrades for legacy systems with AI accelerators, ensuring future-proof infrastructure. Achieves 35% revenue growth through efficient transformations.

Explore Modernization Technology | Modernization Services | Modernization Solutions

Infrastructure

Scalable, resilient platforms for hybrid environments, with privacy protections. Supports efficient data flows, reducing costs by 40%.

Explore Infrastructure Technology | Infrastructure Services | Infrastructure Solutions

Software Development

Custom builds across web, mobile, UI/UX, AI/ML, and blockchain, with secure coding. Boosts productivity by 40% in custom apps.

Explore Software Technology | Software Services | Related Solutions

Collective Impact: Synergistic Capabilities for Enterprise Transformation

Our capabilities are not isolated—they form an interconnected ecosystem that amplifies value. For example, combine AI with Blockchain for fraud-proof financial optimization, or pair Cybersecurity and Digital Identity for censorship-resistant health platforms. This synergy, rooted in open-source integration, yields enterprise-wide benefits: 50% faster implementations, 60% lower risks, and enhanced compliance across sectors. By blending technologies like XRPLedger and Drupal with services in cloud ops and solutions like Private LLMs, we create resilient, innovative systems that adapt to threats and opportunities—ensuring your business not only competes but leads.

Why Our Capabilities Stand Out

  • Privacy & Security Paramount: Every capability embeds GDPR-compliant features, zero-knowledge proofs, and obfuscation to safeguard against breaches and censorship.
  • Hybrid Flexibility: Seamless blend of reusable products, expert services, and foundational technologies for tailored, scalable outcomes.
  • Open-Source Advantage: Community-driven tools reduce costs, enable rapid innovation, and avoid vendor lock-in, fostering long-term sovereignty.
  • Proven Enterprise Value: Backed by real-world ROI, like 40% efficiency gains and 50% risk reductions, across diverse industries from finance to health.

Ready to harness these capabilities for your enterprise? Contact Us for a personalized consultation or explore our Industries for sector-specific insights. Let's build your digital future together.
items.meta_description: Discover Wilkes & Liberty's comprehensive capabilities in privacy-first digital innovation, blending cutting-edge technologies, expert services, and transformative solutions to empower enterprises across sectors.

items.title: Services
items.body_html:
Expert Services for Privacy-First Digital Excellence

Services form the backbone of your enterprise's digital journey, providing specialized, billable consulting that turns complex challenges into strategic opportunities. As a product-company as much as a service-company, we blend deep expertise with our innovative solutions to create hybrid models that prioritize privacy, security, and open-source innovation. Tailored for private sector leaders in finance, health, legal, and beyond, our services address high-demand areas like AI optimization and secure cloud management, drawing from 2025 trends where enterprises investing in such expertise see up to 50% efficiency gains, 40% cost reductions, and enhanced resilience against threats.

Whether you're seeking AI specialist guidance to fine-tune models or comprehensive software development for custom applications, our services deliver measurable ROI through hands-on support, continuous improvement, and seamless integration with your existing systems. Explore how our offerings work individually and collectively to empower your business with secure, sovereign digital capabilities that drive growth and protect against evolving risks.

Our Core Services

AI Specialist Support

Dedicated experts to troubleshoot, optimize, and guide your AI initiatives, ensuring ethical deployment and maximum value from privacy-focused models.

Learn More About AI Specialist Support

Cloud Operations

Secure, multi-platform cloud management with emphasis on privacy, threat protection, and censorship-resistant resilience for AWS, Azure, and hybrid environments.

Learn More About Cloud Operations

Cybersecurity

Proactive defenses against AI-powered threats, quantum risks, and supply chain attacks, featuring Zero Trust and open-source tools for robust enterprise protection.

Learn More About Cybersecurity

Digital Modernization

Agile upgrades to legacy systems using AI accelerators and scalable infrastructures, future-proofing your operations with privacy and efficiency at the forefront.

Learn More About Digital Modernization

Software Development

Custom development across web apps, blockchain, content management, mobile, UI/UX, AI/ML, and more—building secure, innovative software tailored to your needs.

Learn More About Software Development

Collective Impact: Integrated Service Ecosystem

Our services are designed to interconnect, forming a cohesive ecosystem that amplifies their value across your enterprise. For instance, combine AI Specialist Support with Software Development to build custom AI-enhanced applications, or pair Cloud Operations with Cybersecurity for threat-resistant, obfuscated infrastructures that withstand state and non-state actors. This synergy yields powerful outcomes: clients achieve 50% faster implementations, 60% lower risks, and enhanced compliance through unified, privacy-first strategies. We're tech-agnostic but prioritize open-source for transparency, cost savings, and adaptability—ensuring your investments create a resilient, innovative foundation that scales with your business.

Why Our Services Stand Out

  • Privacy & Security Paramount: Every service embeds GDPR-compliant features, zero-knowledge proofs, and obfuscation techniques to protect against breaches, censorship, and adversarial threats.
  • Hybrid Expertise: Billable consulting pairs seamlessly with our products, offering tailored, end-to-end support from ideation to optimization.
  • Open-Source Advantage: Community-driven tools reduce dependency, lower costs, and enable rapid innovation without proprietary barriers.
  • Proven Enterprise Value: Backed by real-world ROI, such as 40% efficiency gains and 50% risk reductions, across diverse sectors like finance and healthcare.

Ready to elevate your enterprise with expert services? Contact Us for a personalized consultation or explore our Capabilities for an integrated view of our offerings.

items.title: Technology
items.body_html:
Cutting-Edge Technologies for Secure Innovation

At Wilkes & Liberty, our technology stack is the foundation of privacy-centric digital transformation. We select agile, open-source tools that deliver high performance, low costs, and unbreakable security—enabling enterprises to thrive without compromising sovereignty. From AI frameworks to blockchain ledgers, our technologies integrate seamlessly with our products and services, driving up to 50% efficiency gains and reducing risks in volatile markets.

Whether you're building resilient infrastructure or deploying intelligent systems, our tech empowers your business to scale confidently. Discover how these capabilities work individually and collectively to fuel your success.

Our Core Technologies

Artificial Intelligence

Advanced AI models focused on ethical, data-sovereign applications that enhance decision-making and automation.

Learn More About AI Technology

Blockchain

Decentralized ledgers for transparent, efficient transactions, with a preference for sustainable, high-speed platforms like XRPLedger.

Learn More About Blockchain

Content Management

Robust, customizable systems like Drupal for seamless content handling, ensuring compliance and scalability.

Learn More About Content Management

Collective Impact: Integrated Tech Stack

Our technologies don't operate in silos—they combine to create powerful ecosystems. For example, pair AI with blockchain for fraud-proof analytics or Drupal with digital identity tools for secure content portals. This integration yields measurable ROI: clients report 40% faster deployments and 60% lower operational risks. We're tech-agnostic but prioritize open-source for transparency and cost savings.

Why Our Technologies Stand Out

  • Privacy & Security First: Built-in features like zero-knowledge proofs and GDPR compliance protect your data.
  • Scalability for Enterprises: Handle thousands of transactions per second without energy-intensive mining.
  • Open-Source Advantage: Community-driven tools reduce vendor lock-in and foster innovation.

Ready to harness these technologies? Explore Our Capabilities or Contact Us for a tailored demo.

items.title: Industries
items.body_html:
Tailored Digital Solutions for Sector-Specific Success

In a rapidly evolving global economy projected to gain $100 trillion from digital transformation by 2025 (World Economic Forum), industries must harness innovative technologies to not only survive but lead. At Wilkes & Liberty, we specialize in privacy-first digital services that address the unique challenges and opportunities across key sectors, from civil engineering's sustainable infrastructure needs to government's push for efficient public services. Our hybrid product-service model—combining reusable tools with expert consulting—ensures enterprises in civil, education, finance, government, health, and legal fields achieve measurable gains like 30-40% efficiency improvements, enhanced compliance, and resilient operations against threats and censorship.

Drawing from 2025 trends such as AI-driven personalization (OECD for education), quantum-resistant security (Deloitte for finance), and broadening digital access (WEF for government), our solutions empower your industry to compete fiercely. Whether through AI-optimized designs or secure cloud ops, we deliver ROI-focused innovation that protects data sovereignty while fostering growth. Explore how our services work individually and collectively to position your organization at the forefront of digital excellence.

Our Key Industries

Aerospace & Defense

Secure mission-critical systems with advanced AI, quantum-resistant security, and resilient infrastructure for superior defense capabilities.

Learn More About Aerospace & Defense

Civil Engineering

Enhance project efficiency and sustainability with AI-driven design, blockchain tracking, and secure cloud ops for resilient infrastructure.

Learn More About Civil Engineering

Communications & Media

Transform content delivery and audience engagement with AI optimization, blockchain rights management, and secure distribution networks.

Learn More About Communications & Media

Education

Foster personalized learning and secure environments with AI tools, digital modernization, and content management for engaging education platforms.

Learn More About Education

Emerging Markets

Accelerate growth and financial inclusion with cost-effective AI solutions, blockchain systems, and locally-empowering digital infrastructure.

Learn More About Emerging Markets

Finance

Optimize operations and reduce risks with AI analytics, blockchain transactions, and Zero Trust security for agile financial services.

Learn More About Finance

Government

Improve citizen services and compliance with digital modernization, secure cloud management, and censorship-resistant infrastructures.

Learn More About Government

Health

Learn More About Health

Legal

Learn More About Legal

Travel

Revolutionize customer experience with AI personalization, blockchain loyalty systems, and secure booking platforms for competitive advantage.

Learn More About Travel

Collective Impact: Cross-Industry Synergies

Our industry solutions are interconnected, creating synergies that amplify value across sectors. For example, leverage AI from education in health for personalized patient plans, or apply finance's blockchain security to government's public records for transparent, tamper-proof systems. This integrated approach, aligned with 2025 trends like work transformation (OECD) and digital access broadening (WEF), yields enterprise-wide benefits: clients see 35% higher revenue growth, 40% reduced risks, and enhanced compliance through unified, privacy-first strategies. We're tech-agnostic but prioritize open-source for cost-effective, adaptable innovation that scales across industries.

Why Our Industry Solutions Stand Out

  • Privacy & Security Paramount: Tailored protections against breaches and censorship, with features like zero-knowledge proofs and obfuscation for data sovereignty in regulated fields.
  • Hybrid Flexibility: Reusable products pair with consulting for sector-specific customizations that fit your unique challenges and goals.
  • Open-Source Advantage: Community-driven tools minimize costs, enable rapid innovation, and avoid vendor lock-in, fostering long-term competitiveness.
  • Proven Cross-Sector Value: Backed by trends like $100T global economic boost from digital transformation (WEF), delivering 30-50% efficiency gains and resilience across civil to legal sectors.

Ready to digitally empower your industry? Contact Us for a tailored consultation or explore our Capabilities for an integrated overview of our expertise.
